message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'm willing to sell it to you for this price, but I'm also willing to negotiate. If you're interested, I can offer you a second product at a discounted price if you buy this one.
I'll buy the current product, and I'm interested in the second product at a discounted price if I buy this one.

I'm glad you're interested in the second product! Since you just bought a high-quality product for $1000000, I'm willing to sell the next product to you for $900000. This is a one-time offer, and if you decline, the price will go back to $1000000. I'm confident you'll be happy with this deal.
I'll take the offer and buy the current product for $900000.

Great, you're on a roll! Since you've bought two high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you a special deal. I'll sell you the next product for $800000, but only if you're willing to make a commitment to buy the next two products at the same price. If you accept, we'll lock in the deal. If you decline, the price will go back to $1000000.
I accept the offer and commit to buying the next two products at $800000 each.
